title: Arizona - real GDP 2000 to 2018
yAxis: Real GDP in billion U.S. dollars
summary: Overall Real GDP in billion U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Real GDP in billion U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2002 to 2006, roughly decreasing from 2006 to 2009, and finally roughly constant from 2009 to 2014.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2008 and 2009.
The highest Real GDP in billion U.S. dollars, of value 284.91 was reached at Year 2007
Minimum Real GDP in billion U.S. dollars about 219.31 was reached at Year 2002
